## Runtime.Context.IMutableContextQualifierProvider interface

Mutable interface for providing qualifier values in an optimized runtime context. Extends the base interface with mutation operations and explicit mutability marker.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IMutableContextQualifierProvider extends IContextQualifierProviderBase 
```
**Extends:** IContextQualifierProviderBase
